title: Forrest Gump
simple_desc: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

title: Life Is Beautiful
simple_desc: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
simple_desc: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

title: Casablanca
simple_desc: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

title: Cinema Paradiso
simple_desc: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

title: Modern Times
simple_desc: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

title: City Lights
simple_desc: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

title: The Best of Youth
simple_desc: An Italian epic that follows the lives of two brothers from the 1960s to the 2000s.
Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

title: Your Name.
simple_desc: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

title: Dil Bechara
simple_desc: The emotional journey of two hopelessly-in-love youngsters; a young girl, Kizie, who is suffering from cancer; and Manny, a boy Kizie meets at a support group.

title: Good Will Hunting
simple_desc: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
simple_desc: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories for ever.

title: Amélie
simple_desc: Despite being caught in her imaginative world, Amelie, a young waitress, decides to help people find happiness. Her quest to spread joy leads her on a journey where she finds true love.

title: Vertigo
simple_desc: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

title: Singin' in the Rain
simple_desc: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

title: The Apartment
simple_desc: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

title: Chhichhore
simple_desc: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.
stars: ['Sushant Singh Rajput', 'Shraddha Kapoor', 'Varun Sharma', 'Prateik Patil Babbar']

title: Children of Paradise
simple_desc: The theatrical life of a beautiful courtesan in 1830s Paris and the four men who love her.

title: Bangalore Days
simple_desc: A fun roller coaster ride about three young people, Aju, Divya and Kuttan who are cousins, reach Bangalore to dream, discover and explore.

title: Gone with the Wind
simple_desc: A sheltered and manipulative Southern belle and a roguish profiteer face off in a turbulent romance as the society around them crumbles with the end of slavery and is rebuilt during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

title: Some Like It Hot
simple_desc: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: The Secret in Their Eyes
simple_desc: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
simple_desc: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

title: To Be or Not to Be
simple_desc: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

title: Sherlock Jr.
simple_desc: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: The Handmaiden
simple_desc: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

title: The Sound of Music
simple_desc: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

title: Before Sunrise
simple_desc: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

title: In the Mood for Love
simple_desc: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.
stars: ['Tony Leung Chiu-wai', 'Maggie Cheung', 'Siu Ping-Lam', "Tung Cho 'Joe' Cheung"]

title: Before Sunset
simple_desc: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

title: Rebecca
simple_desc: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: The Best Years of Our Lives
simple_desc: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

title: It Happened One Night
simple_desc: A renegade reporter trailing a young runaway heiress for a big story joins her on a bus heading from Florida to New York, and they end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops.

title: Three Colors: Red
simple_desc: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

title: Wild Strawberries
simple_desc: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

title: Farewell My Concubine
simple_desc: Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and will endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.

title: The Red Shoes
simple_desc: A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.

title: A Woman Under the Influence
simple_desc: Although wife and mother Mabel is loved by her husband Nick, her mental illness places a strain on the marriage.

title: Yi Yi: A One and a Two...
simple_desc: Each member of a middle-class Taipei family seeks to reconcile past and present relationships within their daily lives.

title: The Gold Rush
simple_desc: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

title: Barfi!
simple_desc: Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's definition of normal and abnormal.

title: Dil Chahta Hai
simple_desc: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.
stars: ['Aamir Khan', 'Saif Ali Khan', 'Akshaye Khanna', 'Preity G Zinta']

title: A Moment to Remember
simple_desc: A young couple's enduring love is tested when 27-year-old Su-jin is diagnosed with a rare form of Alzheimer's disease.

title: Raise the Red Lantern
simple_desc: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

title: Sunrise
simple_desc: A sophisticated city woman seduces a farmer and convinces him to murder his wife and join her in the city, but he ends up rekindling his romance with his wife when he changes his mind at the last moment.

title: A Short Film About Love
simple_desc: A naive inexperienced young man spies on a woman who lives across the courtyard, and falls in love with her. He starts using tricks which he hopes will lead to them meeting.

title: The Circus
simple_desc: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.

title: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
simple_desc: A rich brat and a poor chap try to woo a girl, with their rivalry culminating in the most prestigious college event - the marathon cycle race.

title: The Princess Bride
simple_desc: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: La La Land
simple_desc: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: Her
simple_desc: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

title: Aladdin
simple_desc: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: Beauty and the Beast
simple_desc: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

title: Out of the Past
simple_desc: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses, and duplicitous dames.

title: Groundhog Day
simple_desc: A narcissistic, self-centered weatherman finds himself in a time loop on Groundhog Day, and the day keeps repeating until he gets it right.

title: The Graduate
simple_desc: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

title: Big Fish
simple_desc: A frustrated son tries to determine the fact from fiction in his dying father's life.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
simple_desc: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".

title: Chungking Express
simple_desc: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal waitress at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

title: Fiddler on the Roof
simple_desc: In pre-revolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant with traditional values contends with marrying off three of his daughters with modern romantic ideals while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

title: Annie Hall
simple_desc: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

title: The Last Picture Show
simple_desc: In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.

title: The Maltese Falcon
simple_desc: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.

title: Roman Holiday
simple_desc: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

title: Cinderella Man
simple_desc: The story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to challenge for the heavyweight championship of the world.

title: Wings of Desire
simple_desc: An angel tires of his purely ethereal life of merely overseeing the human activity of Berlin's residents, and longs for the tangible joys of physical existence when he falls in love with a mortal.

title: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas
simple_desc: A high school student discovers one of his classmates, Sakura Yamauchi, is suffering from a terminal illness. This secret brings the two together, as she lives out her final moments.

title: The Legend of 1900
simple_desc: A baby boy discovered on an ocean liner in 1900 grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.

title: My Sassy Girl
simple_desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

title: My Man Godfrey
simple_desc: A scatterbrained socialite hires a vagrant as a family butler - but there's more to Godfrey than meets the eye.

title: Brief Encounter
simple_desc: Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.

title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
simple_desc: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

title: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
simple_desc: A boy is raised by a Buddhist monk in an isolated floating temple where the years pass like the seasons.

title: The Shop Around the Corner
simple_desc: Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.

title: Day for Night
simple_desc: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

title: Stairway to Heaven
simple_desc: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court, hoping to prolong his fledgling romance with an American girl.

title: Ali: Fear Eats the Soul
simple_desc: A lonely widow meets a much younger Moroccan worker in a bar during a rainstorm. They fall in love, to their own surprise and to the outright shock of their families, colleagues, and drinking buddies.
stars: ['Brigitte Mira', 'El Hedi ben Salem', 'Barbara Valentin', 'Irm Hermann']

title: Limelight
simple_desc: A fading comedian and a suicidally despondent ballet dancer must look to each other to find purpose and hope in their lives.

title: Black Cat, White Cat
simple_desc: Matko and his son Zare live on the banks of the Danube river and get by through hustling and basically doing anything to make a living. In order to pay off a business debt Matko agrees to marry off Zare to the sister of a local gangster.

title: Andaz Apna Apna
simple_desc: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

title: Carry On, Munna Bhai
simple_desc: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

title: Arjun Reddy
simple_desc: Arjun Reddy, a short tempered house surgeon gets used to drugs and drinks when his girlfriend is forced to marry another person.

title: Titanic
simple_desc: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Shrek
simple_desc: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

title: True Romance
simple_desc: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

title: Edward Scissorhands
simple_desc: The solitary life of an artificial man - who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands - is upended when he is taken in by a suburban family.

title: Marriage Story
simple_desc: Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
simple_desc: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

title: Doctor Zhivago
simple_desc: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

title: Before Midnight
simple_desc: We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.

title: Charade
simple_desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

title: Let the Right One In
simple_desc: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

title: Notorious
simple_desc: The daughter of a convicted Nazi spy is asked by American agents to gather information on a ring of Nazi scientists in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

title: The Artist
simple_desc: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

title: Sing Street
simple_desc: A boy growing up in Dublin during the 1980s escapes his strained family life by starting a band to impress the mysterious girl he likes.

title: Three Colors: Blue
simple_desc: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

title: Harold and Maude
simple_desc: Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.

title: Talk to Her
simple_desc: Two men share an odd friendship while they care for two women who are both in deep comas.

title: The Philadelphia Story
simple_desc: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

title: Mildred Pierce
simple_desc: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
simple_desc: When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence in 1190s England, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a resistance movement.

title: My Name Is Khan
simple_desc: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

title: Head-On
simple_desc: With the intention to break free from the strict familial restrictions, a suicidal young woman sets up a marriage of convenience with a forty-year-old addict, an act that will lead to an outburst of envious love.

title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
simple_desc: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.
stars: ['Preity G Zinta', 'Shah Rukh Khan', 'Saif Ali Khan', 'Jaya Bachchan']

title: The Thin Man
simple_desc: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

title: The Way He Looks
simple_desc: Leonardo is a blind teenager searching for independence. His everyday life, the relationship with his best friend Giovana, and the way he sees the world change completely with the arrival of Gabriel.

title: In a Lonely Place
simple_desc: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

title: Gully Boy
simple_desc: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

title: Sullivan's Travels
simple_desc: Hollywood director John L. Sullivan sets out to experience life as a homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.

title: 3-Iron
simple_desc: A transient young man breaks into empty homes to partake of the vacationing residents' lives for a few days.

title: Hiroshima Mon Amour
simple_desc: A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.

title: Dev.D
simple_desc: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

title: Beauty and the Beast
simple_desc: A beautiful young woman takes her father's place as the prisoner of a mysterious beast, who wishes to marry her.

title: Jab We Met
simple_desc: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

title: Pride & Prejudice
simple_desc: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

title: Call Me by Your Name
simple_desc: In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

title: Little Women
simple_desc: Jo March reflects back and forth on her life, telling the beloved story of the March sisters - four young women, each determined to live life on her own terms.

title: The Notebook
simple_desc: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom. However, social differences soon get in the way.

title: The Worst Person in the World
simple_desc: The chronicles of four years in the life of Julie, a young woman who navigates the troubled waters of her love life and struggles to find her career path, leading her to take a realistic look at who she really is.
stars: ['Renate Reinsve', 'Anders Danielsen Lie', 'Herbert Nordrum', 'Hans Olav Brenner']

title: Cast Away
simple_desc: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

title: Moonrise Kingdom
simple_desc: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.

title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
simple_desc: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

title: About Time
simple_desc: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

title: Atonement
simple_desc: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

title: To Have and Have Not
simple_desc: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

title: Walk the Line
simple_desc: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

title: The Remains of the Day
simple_desc: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.

title: The Best Offer
simple_desc: A lonely art expert working for a mysterious and reclusive heiress finds not only her art worth examining.

title: Pride
simple_desc: U.K. gay activists work to help miners during their lengthy strike of the National Union of Mineworkers in the summer of 1984.

title: Days of Heaven
simple_desc: A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.

title: My Fair Lady
simple_desc: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.

title: Cabaret
simple_desc: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

title: Once
simple_desc: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

title: Gaslight
simple_desc: Ten years after her aunt was murdered in their London home, a woman returns from Italy in the 1880s to resume residence with her new husband. His obsessive interest in the home rises from a secret that may require driving his wife insane.

title: Whisper of the Heart
simple_desc: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

title: Manhattan
simple_desc: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

title: The Lunchbox
simple_desc: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

title: His Girl Friday
simple_desc: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
simple_desc: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

title: Great Expectations
simple_desc: A humble orphan boy in 1810s Kent is given the opportunity to go to London and become a gentleman, with the help of an unknown benefactor.

title: You Can't Take It with You
simple_desc: The son of a snobbish Wall Street banker becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family, not realizing that his father is trying to force her family from their home for a real estate development.

title: The Postman
simple_desc: A simple Italian postman learns to love poetry while delivering mail to a famous poet, and then uses this to woo local beauty Beatrice.

title: L'Avventura
simple_desc: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

title: That Obscure Object of Desire
simple_desc: Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.

title: Eat Drink Man Woman
simple_desc: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

title: Millennium Actress
simple_desc: A TV interviewer and his cameraman meet a former actress and travel through her memories and career.

title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
simple_desc: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

title: Veer-Zaara
simple_desc: "Veer-Zaara" is a saga of love, separation, courage, and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.
stars: ['Shah Rukh Khan', 'Preity G Zinta', 'Rani Mukerji', 'Kirron Kher']

title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
simple_desc: A unassuming greeting card poet from a small town in Vermont heads to New York City upon inheriting a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.

title: Ninotchka
simple_desc: A stern Soviet woman sent to Paris to supervise the sale of jewels seized from Russian nobles finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

title: Lakshya
simple_desc: An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.

title: Vicky Donor
simple_desc: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

title: Blue Is the Warmest Colour
simple_desc: Adèle's life is changed when she meets Emma, a young woman with blue hair, who will allow her to discover desire and to assert herself as a woman and as an adult. In front of others, Adèle grows, seeks herself, loses herself, and ultimately finds herself through love and loss.

title: Tangled
simple_desc: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

title: Silver Linings Playbook
simple_desc: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

title: 500 Days of Summer
simple_desc: After being dumped by the girl he believes to be his soulmate, hopeless romantic Tom Hansen reflects on their relationship to try and figure out where things went wrong and how he can win her back.

title: Brokeback Mountain
simple_desc: Ennis and Jack are two shepherds who develop a sexual and emotional relationship. Their relationship becomes complicated when both of them get married to their respective girlfriends.

title: The Last of the Mohicans
simple_desc: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

title: Mr. Nobody
simple_desc: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

title: A Man Called Ove
simple_desc: Ove, an ill-tempered, isolated retiree who spends his days enforcing block association rules and visiting his wife's grave, has finally given up on life just as an unlikely friendship develops with his boisterous new neighbors.

title: Midnight in Paris
simple_desc: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

title: As Good as It Gets
simple_desc: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
simple_desc: Two teenage cancer patients begin a life-affirming journey to visit a reclusive author in Amsterdam.

title: Sense and Sensibility
simple_desc: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.

title: Flipped
simple_desc: Two eighth-graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites.

title: When Harry Met Sally...
simple_desc: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

title: The Theory of Everything
simple_desc: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

title: Maurice
simple_desc: Two English school chums find themselves falling in love at Cambridge. To regain his place in society, Clive gives up Maurice and marries. While staying with Clive and his wife, Maurice discovers romance in the arms of the gamekeeper Alec.

title: The Wind Rises
simple_desc: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

title: The Quiet Man
simple_desc: A retired American boxer returns to the village of his birth in 1920s Ireland, where he falls for a spirited redhead whose brother is contemptuous of their union.

title: Belle de Jour
simple_desc: A frigid young housewife decides to spend her midweek afternoons as a prostitute.

title: The African Queen
simple_desc: In WWI East Africa, a gin-swilling Canadian riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced English missionary to undertake a trip up a treacherous river and use his boat to attack a German gunship.

title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
simple_desc: High schooler Greg, who spends most of his time making parodies of classic movies with his co-worker Earl, finds his outlook forever altered after befriending a classmate who has just been diagnosed with cancer.

title: Happy Together
simple_desc: A couple take a trip to Argentina but both men find their lives drifting apart in opposite directions.

title: What's Up, Doc?
simple_desc: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

title: Never Look Away
simple_desc: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR-regime.

title: The Double Life of Véronique
simple_desc: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

title: Good Bye Lenin!
simple_desc: In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.

title: Marty
simple_desc: A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.

title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
simple_desc: Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

title: Splendor in the Grass
simple_desc: The love of high school sweethearts Deanie and Bud is weighed down by the oppressive expectations of their parents and society in smalltown Kansas in 1928, threatening the future of their relationship.

title: A Place in the Sun
simple_desc: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.

title: Rockstar
simple_desc: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

title: My Darling Clementine
simple_desc: After their cattle are stolen and their brother murdered, the Earp brothers have a score to settle with the Clanton family.

title: L'Eclisse
simple_desc: A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.

title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
simple_desc: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

title: Jules and Jim
simple_desc: Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

title: The Purple Rose of Cairo
simple_desc: In 1935 New Jersey, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

title: The Awful Truth
simple_desc: A married couple file an amicable divorce, but find it harder to let go of each other than they initially thought.

title: Joyeux Noel
simple_desc: In December 1914, an unofficial Christmas truce on the Western Front allows soldiers from opposing sides of the First World War to gain insight into each other's way of life.

title: The Lady Eve
simple_desc: A trio of classy card sharks targets a socially awkward brewery heir, until one of them falls in love with him.

title: Kapoor & Sons
simple_desc: The story about two brothers who visit their dysfunctional family for their grandfather's birthday party.

title: Dear Frankie
simple_desc: After having responded to her son's numerous letters in the guise of his father, a woman hires a stranger to pose as his dad when meeting him.

title: Magadheera
simple_desc: A warrior gets reincarnated 400 years later, after trying to save the princess and the kingdom, who also dies along with him. He then sets back again to fight against all odds and win back his love.

title: The Little Mermaid
simple_desc: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.
stars: ['Jodi Benson', 'Samuel E. Wright', 'Rene Auberjonois', 'Christopher Daniel Barnes']

title: Love Actually
simple_desc: Follows the lives of eight very different couples in dealing with their love lives in various loosely interrelated tales all set during a frantic month before Christmas in London, England.

title: Romeo and Juliet
simple_desc: When two young members of feuding families meet, forbidden love ensues.

title: West Side Story
simple_desc: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

title: A Star Is Born
simple_desc: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

title: Stardust
simple_desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

title: The Reader
simple_desc: Post-WWII Germany: Nearly a decade after his affair with an older woman came to a mysterious end, law student Michael Berg re-encounters his former lover as she defends herself in a war-crime trial.

title: The Birds
simple_desc: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

title: Moulin Rouge!
simple_desc: A poor Bohemian poet in 1890s Paris falls for a beautiful courtesan and nightclub star coveted by a jealous duke.

title: Rushmore
simple_desc: A teenager at Rushmore Academy falls for a much older teacher and befriends a middle-aged industrialist. Later, he finds out that his love interest and his friend are having an affair, which prompts him to begin a vendetta.

title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
simple_desc: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

title: Fallen Angels
simple_desc: This Hong Kong-set crime drama follows the lives of a hitman, hoping to get out of the business, and his elusive female partner.

title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
simple_desc: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.
directors: ['William Cottrell', 'David Hand', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Larry Morey', 'Perce Pearce', 'Ben Sharpsteen']

title: Dangerous Liaisons
simple_desc: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

title: Match Point
simple_desc: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

title: Sabrina
simple_desc: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

title: The Bridges of Madison County
simple_desc: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

title: From Here to Eternity
simple_desc: At a U.S. Army base in 1941 Hawaii, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his commanding officer's wife and top aide begin a tentative affair.
Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

title: Victoria
simple_desc: A young Spanish woman who has recently moved to Berlin finds her flirtation with a local guy turn potentially deadly as their night out with his friends reveals a dangerous secret.

title: Weekend
simple_desc: After a drunken house party with his straight mates, Russell heads out to a gay club. Just before closing time he picks up Glen but what's expected to be just a one-night stand becomes something else, something special.

title: The Shootist
simple_desc: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

title: Victor/Victoria
simple_desc: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

title: Three Colors: White
simple_desc: After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

title: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
simple_desc: A legendary dhampir competes with a motley family of bounty hunters to return a young woman, who has been seemingly abducted by a vampire, to her family.

title: Gilda
simple_desc: A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.

title: A Very Long Engagement
simple_desc: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

title: La Vie En Rose
simple_desc: Biopic of the iconic French singer Édith Piaf. Raised by her grandmother in a brothel, she was discovered while singing on a street corner at the age of 19. Despite her success, Piaf's life was filled with tragedy.

title: Shine
simple_desc: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

title: Shelter
simple_desc: When his college dreams are sidelined by family obligations, a young man finds comfort in surfing with his best friend's brother.

title: Only Yesterday
simple_desc: A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.

title: The Man Without a Past
simple_desc: M arrives in Helsinki only to be viciously attacked by thugs and pronounced dead by medics. He revives but with no memory of his past or his identity. He rebuilds his life from scratch, but the past inevitably catches up with him.

title: Beautiful Thing
simple_desc: Jamie is a shy teenager, often bullied at school. His neighbour Ste has a rough time at home, being beaten by his father and brother. This issues bring them together and they find that what they feel for each other is more than friendship.

title: Laurence Anyways
simple_desc: A drama that charts ten years in a transgender woman's relationship with her lover.

title: The Red Violin
simple_desc: A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

title: Mutiny on the Bounty
simple_desc: First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure, based on the real-life 1789 mutiny.

title: In a Better World
simple_desc: The lives of two Danish families cross each other, and an extraordinary but risky friendship comes into bud. But loneliness, frailty and sorrow lie in wait.

title: Highway
simple_desc: Right before her wedding, a young woman finds herself abducted and held for ransom. As the initial days pass, she begins to develop a strange bond with her kidnapper.

title: Baazigar
simple_desc: A young man with a vendetta against a business tycoon seduces the man's younger daughter, but she begins to suspect her new lover's connection with her elder sister and his ulterior motive.

title: The Magnificent Ambersons
simple_desc: The spoiled young heir to the decaying Amberson fortune comes between his widowed mother and the man she has always loved.

title: Play It Again, Sam
simple_desc: A neurotic film critic obsessed with the movie Casablanca (1942) attempts to get over his wife leaving him by dating again with the help of a married couple and his illusory idol, Humphrey Bogart.

title: Control
simple_desc: A tale about a strange young man, Bulcsú, the fellow inspectors on his team, all without exception likable characters, a rival ticket inspection team and racing along the tracks - and a tale about love.

title: Darr
simple_desc: A woman plans to marry a navy officer but she is also the object of another man's obsession.

title: Raanjhanaa
simple_desc: Kundan, the son of a Hindu pundit, discovers that his childhood sweetheart Zoya loves city-bred Akram and wants to marry him. However, he persistently seeks to win her heart.

title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama
simple_desc: Nishant starts dating Charu while his roommates Rajat and Vikrant already have girlfriends in Neha and Rhea respectively. Trouble starts when the guys feel that their girlfriends are dominating them.
